Group.Name: Actuals
Group.Description__c: Contains configuration options related to how roll up of actuals (e.g. timecards, expenses, milestone, etc.) occur across the system (into regions, practices, groups)

Option.Name: BillableExternalHoursCategories
Option.Description__c: List of categories (in the transaction object) that will be rolled up into this actuals category

Option.Name: BillableExternalHoursDisabled
Option.Description__c: List of entity names (Region, Practice, Group, Project, Resource) for which billable external hours are not rolled up

Option.Name: BillableInternalHoursCategories
Option.Description__c: List of categories (in the transaction object) that will be rolled up into this actuals category

Option.Name: BillableInternalHoursDisabled
Option.Description__c: List of entity names (Region, Practice, Group, Project, Resource) for which billable internal hours are not rolled up

Option.Name: BillingsCategories

Option.Name: BillingsDisabled

Option.Description__c: Apex batch size to use for actuals calculation from the verifier

Option.Name: CalculationDeltaBatchSize

Option.Description__c: Apex batch size to use for actuals calculation from transaction deltas

Option.Name: CalculationMode
Option.Description__c: Determines when actuals are calculated. If Immediate, actuals are calculated as transactions are inserted/updated. If Scheduled, an asynchronous process is used to calculate actuals from transactions periodically.

Option.Name: CreditedNonBillableInternalHoursDisabled

Option.Name: DeleteBatchRunInParallel
Option.Help_Text__c: Run the 6 actuals delete batches in parallel (true) or in series (false). Enable only if FlexQueue is enabled.

Option.Name: VerifierMaxScope
Option.Help_Text__c: This config is used make the maximum number of query rows (of Actuals records) configurable. Value will be used for specifying the limit in select query. Scopes significantly greater than 25000 risk the query row governor limit on results display.

Otherwise it will add up to this number of billing event items per each type of business object.

Option.Name: separateMilestones

Option.Name: use-new-pre-bill-field-if-populated
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, this config uses the new Pre-Bill field on Budget (Pre_Billed_Amount__c: 16,2) instead of the old one (PreBilledAmount__c: 18,0) for both reads and writes. On reads, if the new field is blank, code will then check the old field. If false, only the old field is used (old behavior).
Option.Description__c: If set to true, this config uses the new Pre-Bill field on Budget (Pre_Billed_Amount__c: 16,2) instead of the old one (PreBilledAmount__c: 18,0) for both reads and writes. On reads, if the new field is blank, code will then check the old field.

Group.Name: Create Project
Group.Description__c: Settings related to creating a project from an opportunity. Predominately, these settings effect the create project UI screens that combine information from multiple objects

Option.Name: add-assignment-checkbox-to-create-project-rr-list
Option.Help_Text__c: When a user creates a project from an opportunity or project template, indicates whether Create Assignment is displayed on the Resource Request Mappings section of the Create Project page. The default value is true.
Option.Description__c: When a user creates a project from an opportunity or project template, indicates whether Create Assignment is displayed on the Resource Request Mappings section of the Create Project page. The default value is true.

Option.Name: always-copy-resource-requests-from-opportunity
Option.Description__c: Resource Requests are displayed optionally on the Create Project from Opp/Template UI (Controlled by configuration option: display-resource-requests). Though this property if "true" this will always copy resoource requests (whether displayed or not)

Option.Name: budget-default-use-services-attached-from-products
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, this uses the Services Attached From Products field (if greater than 0) on Opportunity instead of Opportunity Amount as a starting point for the default amount of the new Budget.
Option.Description__c: If true, this uses the Services Attached From Products field (if greater than 0) on Opportunity instead of Opportunity Amount as a starting point for the default amount of the new Budget.

Option.Name: budget-default-using-existing-expense-amounts
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, this ensures that the default Budget amount subtracts both Expense Amounts along with Budget Amounts from the Opportunity total to arrive at the default amount for the new Budget.
Option.Description__c: If true, this ensures that the default Budget amount subtracts both Expense Amounts along with Budget Amounts from the Opportunity total to arrive at the default amount for the new Budget.

Option.Name: budget-name-suffix
Option.Description__c: Suffix for the budget name

Option.Name: budget-type-picklist-values
Option.Picklist_Values__c: Customer Purchase Order Vendor Purchase Order Work Order Internal Budget Customer Purchase Order Change Request Vendor Purchase Order Change Request Work Order Change Request Internal Budget Change Request
Option.Description__c: Default values for budget picklist

Option.Name: copy-project-task-assignments-from-template-tasks
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, Project Task assignment child object(s) on project task will be copied on creating project from project template. Default config value will be false.
Option.Description__c: If true, Project Task assignment child object(s) on project task will be copied on creating project from project template. Default config value will be false.

Option.Name: copy-template-project-tasks-default
Option.Help_Text__c: When true, the Copy Template Project Tasks and Task Dependencies checkbox on the Create Project from Template page is selected when the page loads. The default value is true
Option.Description__c: When true, the Copy Template Project Tasks and Task Dependencies checkbox on the Create Project from Template page is selected when the page loads. The default value is true

Option.Name: create-budget-default
Option.Help_Text__c: When true, the Create Budget checkbox on the Create Project from Template page is selected when the page loads. The default value is true.
Option.Description__c: When true, the Create Budget checkbox on the Create Project from Template page is selected when the page loads. The default value is true.

Option.Name: create-budget-from-selected-service-product-line-items
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, display a page for selection of the service product line items and use sum of these (if greater than 0) instead of Opportunity Amount as a starting point for the default amount of the new Budget.
Option.Description__c: If true, display a page for selection of the service product line items and use sum of these (if greater than 0) instead of Opportunity Amount as a starting point for the default amount of the new Budget.

Option.Name: create-project-from-template-adjust-exceptions-default
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Adjust Schedule Exceptions checkbox on the Create Project page is selected by default when creating a project from a template. The default value is true.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Adjust Schedule Exceptions checkbox on the Create Project page is selected by default when creating a project from a template. The default value is true.

Option.Name: create-project-from-template-default-records-per-page
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines the number of records to display per tab on the Create Project From Template page. The default value is 5.
Option.Description__c: Determines the number of records to display per tab on the Create Project From Template page. The default value is 5.

Option.Name: create-project-from-template-ignore-holidays-default
Option.Help_Text__c: When true and creating an assignment from a template project, the Ignore Holidays checkbox is selected by default. The default value is true.
Option.Description__c: When true and creating an assignment from a template project, the Ignore Holidays checkbox is selected by default. The default value is true.

Option.Name: create-project-with-no-opp-update-permission
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether a user who has no edit permission on opportunities can create a project from an opportunity by clicking Create Project or Create Project from Opportunity in the Project related list without updating the Primary Project field. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether a user who has no edit permission on opportunities can create a project from an opportunity by clicking Create Project or Create Project from Opportunity in the Project related list without updating the Primary Project field.

Option.Name: default-budget-name
Option.Description__c: Allow default budget name or not. If true default budget name will be shown on ui else if false budget name will be shown as blank on ui.

Option.Name: default-budget-status
Option.Description__c: Default value for budget status

Option.Name: default-budget-type
Option.Description__c: Default value for budget type

Option.Name: default-group-from-template
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Group in the Create Project from Template page comes from the template. If true, the value is from the template. When false, the value is from the opportunity or group that the page was opened from, otherwise it is not set.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Group in the Create Project from Template page comes from the template. If true, the value is from the template. When false, the value is from the opportunity or group that the page was opened from, otherwise it is not set.

Option.Name: default-is-active
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether new projects are active by default.

Option.Name: default-is-billable
Option.Description__c: Default value for this field when creating a new project from a template project.

Option.Name: default-practice-from-template
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Practice in the Create Project from Template page comes from the template. If true, the value is from the template. When false, the value is from the opportunity or practice that the page was opened from, otherwise it is not set.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Practice in the Create Project from Template page comes from the template. If true, the value is from the template. When false, the value is from the opportunity or practice that the page was opened from, otherwise it is not set.

Option.Name: default-project-name
Option.Description__c: Allow default project name or not. If true default project name shown on ui else if false project name will be shown as blank on ui.

Option.Name: default-project-owner
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines the default value in the Project Owner field when creating a project from an opportunity. When the value is incorrect or not set, Opportunity Owner is set as the default project owner. Values are Opportunity Owner, Current User and Blank.
Option.Description__c: Determines the default value in the Project Owner field when creating a project from an opportunity. When the value is incorrect or not set, Opportunity Owner is set as the default project owner. Values are Opportunity Owner, Current User and Blank.

Option.Name: default-region-from-template
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Region in the Create Project from Template page comes from the template. If true, the value is from the template. When false, the value is from the opportunity or region that the page was opened from, otherwise it is not set.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Region in the Create Project from Template page comes from the template. If true, the value is from the template. When false, the value is from the opportunity or region that the page was opened from, otherwise it is not set.

Option.Name: default-time-credited
Option.Description__c: Default value for this field when creating a new project from a template project.

Option.Name: default-time-excluded
Option.Description__c: Default value for this field when creating a new project from a template project.

Option.Name: display-resource-requests
Option.Description__c: If true, display this field on the create project UI

Option.Name: is-budget-amount-required
Option.Description__c: If true, this field is required on the create project UI screen

Option.Name: is-budget-effective-date-required
Option.Description__c: If true, this field is required on the create project UI screen

Option.Name: is-budget-name-required
Option.Description__c: If true, this field is required on the create project UI screen

Option.Name: is-budget-prebilled-amount-required
Option.Description__c: If true, this field is required on the create project UI screen

Option.Name: is-budget-status-required
Option.Description__c: If true, this field is required on the create project UI screen

Option.Name: milestone-list-sort-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: Comma delimited list of API names of fields on which to sort the milestones listed on the Create Project from Template page. The default value is CreatedDate, which sorts the milestones by the date on which they were created.
Option.Description__c: Comma delimited list of API names of fields on which to sort the milestones listed on the Create Project from Template page. The default value is CreatedDate, which sorts the milestones by the date on which they were created.

Option.Name: milestone-list-sort-descending
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the list of milestones on the Create Project from Template page is to be sorted in descending order. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the list of milestones on the Create Project from Template page is to be sorted in descending order. The default value is false.

Option.Name: not-subtract-existing-budgets
Option.Help_Text__c: If this config is set to true then just the amount (calculated budget amount) is used, whether from Opportunity total or from selected Opportunity Products. No Budget amount or expense amount is subtracted from it. For its expected behavior, it is assumed that configs " budget-default-use-services-attached-from-products" and "create-budget-from-selected-service-product-line-items" are set to true.
Option.Description__c: If this config is set to true then just the amount (calculated budget amount) is used, whether from Opportunity total or from selected Opportunity Products. No Budget amount or expense amount is subtracted from it.

Option.Name: project-name-suffix
Option.Description__c: Suffix for the project name

Option.Name: task-list-sort-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: Comma delimited list of API names of fields on which to sort the project tasks listed on the Create Project from Template page. The default value is CreatedDate, which sorts the project tasks by the date on which they were created.
Option.Description__c: Comma delimited list of API names of fields on which to sort the project tasks listed on the Create Project from Template page. The default value is CreatedDate, which sorts the project tasks by the date on which they were created.

Option.Name: task-list-sort-descending
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the list of project tasks on the Create Project from Template page is to be sorted in descending order. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the list of project tasks on the Create Project from Template page is to be sorted in descending order. The default value is false.

Group.Name: Currencies
Group.Description__c: Configurations related to multi-currency support

Option.Name: Use_Dated_Exchange_Rates
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether dated exchange rates should be used for multi-currency conversions. Is true by default but may be set to false if multiple currencies are not being used in the app.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether dated exchange rates should be used for multi-currency conversions. Is true by default but may be set to false if multiple currencies are not being used in the app.

Option.Name: Use_Salesforce_Advanced_Multi_Currency
Option.Help_Text__c: This configuration determines whether Salesforce's Advanced Multi-Currency and DatedConversionRate or Appirio's custom Currency Rate tables should be used for multi-currency conversions.
Option.Description__c: This configuration determines whether Salesforce's Advanced Multi-Currency and DatedConversionRate or Appirio's custom Currency Rate tables should be used for multi-currency conversions.

Group.Name: Expense
Group.Description__c: Configurations related to expenses

Option.Name: additional-er-fields
Option.Help_Text__c: Comma separated list of API names of expense report fields to be displayed on the Edit Expense page as additional fields.
Option.Description__c: Comma separated list of API names of expense report fields to be displayed on the Edit Expense page as additional fields.

Option.Name: additional-expense-fields
Option.Help_Text__c: Comma separated list of API names of expense fields to be displayed on the Edit Expense page as additional fields in the Notes Detail section.
Option.Description__c: Comma separated list of API names of expense fields to be displayed on the Edit Expense page as additional fields in the Notes Detail section.

Option.Name: allow-billable-expense-fees
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether to allow addition of Billable Expense fees (flat or percentage) to Expense Billable Amounts.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether to allow addition of Billable Expense fees (flat or percentage) to Expense Billable Amounts.

Option.Name: allow-delegated-expense-report-entry
Option.Description__c: Whether the expense report page will attempt to load additional resources that the user has permission to create expense reports for.

Option.Name: allow-deletion-of-submitted-expenses
Option.Help_Text__c: Allows deletion of Submitted expenses. The default is true.
Option.Description__c: Allows deletion of Submitted expenses. The default is true.

Option.Name: allow-post-submit-edits-after-close
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, 'Closed for Expense Entry' checkboxes on parent Projects/Asssignments/Milestones only stop expense entry of new or un-submitted Expense Reports/Expenses. Post-submit Admin/Approver/Billing Edits would be allowed, subject to existing permissions. Default false (existing behavior, closure blocks material edits).
Option.Description__c: If true, 'Closed for Expense Entry' checkboxes on parent Projects/Asssignments/Milestones only stop expense entry of new or un-submitted Expense Reports/Expenses. Post-submit Admin/Approver/Billing Edits would be allowed, subject to existing permissions.

Option.Name: Allow_Mixed_Billable_Non_Billable_Expense_Reports
Option.Help_Text__c: Whether a single expense report can contain billable and non-billable expenses
Option.Description__c: Whether a single expense report can contain billable and non-billable expenses

Option.Name: always-use-project-expense-limit-amount
Option.Description__c: Whether limits and rates that are assigned directly to a project are used regardless of other limits

Option.Name: assignment-lookup-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: List of API names of assignment fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the Expense Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Nick_Name__c.
Option.Description__c: List of API names of assignment fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the Expense Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Nick_Name__c.

Option.Name: assignment-project-editable-after-save
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, the project or assignment can be changed for the given expense row. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: If true, the Project and/or Assignment can be changed as long as Expense is in Saved Status and Calculation Mode for Actuals is set to Scheduled.

Option.Name: assignment-project-editable-after-save-audit-notes
Option.Help_Text__c: The "assignment-project-editable-after-save" configuration option enables users to change the project or assignment for saved expenses. However, this requires audit notes to be created for expenses using this configuration option. This configuration contains tokens which are replaced during an update. The valid token names are as follow: <user> - the current user performing the action in the Expense UI. <date> - today's date. <oldproject> - the original project name. <newproject> - the new project name. The default value is: User <user> changed the Project from <oldproject> to <newproject> on <date>.
Option.Description__c: The assignment-project-editable-after-save option enables users to change the project/assignment for the saved expense. However, this requires audit notes to be set for expenses. Audit notes can be set using this configuration.

Value.Value__c: User <user> changed the Project from <oldproject> to <newproject> on <date>

Option.Name: assignment-project-editable-after-save-audit-notes-on-expense-report
Option.Help_Text__c: Enables users to change the project or assignment for the saved expense report. Note, this requires audit notes to be set for expense report. Audit notes can be set using this configuration.
Option.Description__c: Enables users to change the project or assignment for the saved expense report. Note, this requires audit notes to be set for expense report. Audit notes can be set using this configuration.

Value.Value__c: User <user> changed the Project from <oldproject> to <newproject> on <date>

Option.Name: assignment-project-editable-after-save-on-expense-report
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, the project or assignment can be changed for the given expense report. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: If true, the project or assignment can be changed for the given expense report. The default value is false.

Option.Name: assignment-tooltip-fields
Option.Help_Text__c: List of assignment fields to be shown as tooltip on ExpenseEntry UI.
Option.Description__c: List of assignment fields to be shown as tooltip on ExpenseEntry UI.

Option.Name: auto-share-with-project-manager-user
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the level of sharing with the project manager for newly created expenses. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.
Option.Description__c: Defines the level of sharing with the project manager for newly created expenses. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.

Option.Name: auto-share-with-project-resources
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the level of sharing with assigned project resources for newly created expenses. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.
Option.Description__c: Defines the level of sharing with assigned project resources for newly created expenses. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.

Option.Description__c: Defines the Fieldset names of assignment fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the Expense Entry page.

Option.Name: custom-edit-expense-header-row-editable-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this configuration. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as editable fields on the header lines on the Edit Expense page.
Option.Description__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this configuration. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as editable fields on the header lines on the Edit Expense page.

Option.Name: custom-expense-header-row-read-only-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this configuration. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as read only fields on the header lines on the Edit Expense and Expense Entry UI pages.
Option.Description__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this configuration. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as read only fields on the header lines on the Edit Expense and Expense Entry UI pages.

Option.Name: custom-expense-notes-editable-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this config. Fields added to this field set will be shown as editable fields in the expense line notes section on the Edit Expense and Expense Entry UI pages.
Option.Description__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this config. Fields added to this field set will be shown as editable fields in the expense line notes section on the Edit Expense and Expense Entry UI pages.

Option.Name: custom-expense-notes-read-only-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this config. Fields added to this field set will be shown as read only fields in the expense line notes section on the Edit Expense and Expense Entry UI pages.
Option.Description__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this config. Fields added to this field set will be shown as read only fields in the expense line notes section on the Edit Expense and Expense Entry UI pages.

Option.Name: custom-expense-report-editable-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense Report object and write its API name to this configuration. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as editable in the additional expense report fields section on the Edit Expense page.
Option.Description__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense Report object and write its API name to this configuration. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as editable in the additional expense report fields section on the Edit Expense page.

Option.Name: custom-expense-report-read-only-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense Report object and write its API name to this config. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as read only fields in the additional expense report fields section on the Edit Expense page.
Option.Description__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense Report object and write its API name to this config. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as read only fields in the additional expense report fields section on the Edit Expense page.

Option.Name: custom-multi-expense-header-row-editable-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this configuration. Fields added to this field set will be displayed as editable fields on the header lines on the Expense Entry UI page.
Option.Description__c: Enables you to create a custom field set on the Expense object and write its API name to this configuration.Fields added to this field set will be displayed as editable fields on the header lines on the Expense Entry UI page.

Option.Description__c: Defines Fieldset names of Project fields to display as columns on Project/Assignment lookup in Expense Entry page.

Option.Name: default-incurred-tax-non-billable
Option.Help_Text__c: This config flag determines default value of the tax non-billable checkbox. If set to true then checkbox will be shown checked.
Option.Description__c: This config flag determines default value of the tax non-billable checkbox. If set to true then checkbox will be shown checked.

Option.Name: default-milestone-to-assignment-milestone
Option.Help_Text__c: This config flag determines whether an Expense Report entered with no Milestone should have its Milestone defaulted from its Assignment.
Option.Description__c: This config flag determines whether an Expense Report entered with no Milestone should have its Milestone defaulted from its Assignment.

Option.Name: delete-expenses-on-er-delete
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, auto-delete all child Expenses when parent Expense Report is deleted. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If true, auto-delete all child Expenses when parent Expense Report is deleted. Default false.

Option.Name: disable-milestone-copy-from-er-to-expense
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, disables trigger-based auto-copy of Expense Report Milestone to Expense. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If true, disables trigger-based auto-copy of Expense Report Milestone to Expense. Default false.

Option.Name: display-account-on-resource-lookup
Option.Help_Text__c: [DEPRECATED] Use resource-lookup-columns instead and include 'Account.Name' in delimited list of fields to show Account in column on Resource lookup pop-up.
Option.Description__c: [DEPRECATED] Use resource-lookup-columns instead and include 'Account.Name' in delimited list of fields to show Account in column on Resource lookup pop-up.

Option.Name: display-billable-amount
Option.Description__c: If true, displays this field on the expense UI

Option.Name: display-billable-checkbox-for-expenses
Option.Description__c: If true, displays this checkbox on the expense UI

Option.Name: display-incurred-tax-non-billable
Option.Description__c: If true, displays this Checkbox on the expense UI

Option.Name: display-methodology-field
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Methodology field is displayed on the Expense Entry page and when creating and editing expense reports. The default value is true.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Methodology field is displayed on the Expense Entry page and when creating and editing expense reports. The default value is true.

Option.Name: display-milestone-field
Option.Description__c: Whether to display the milestone field on the edit expenses UI

Option.Name: display-non-billable-incurred-amount
Option.Description__c: If true, displays this Textbox on the expense UI

Option.Name: display-non-reimbursable-amount
Option.Help_Text__c: By Default, the Billable amount is reimbursable. When this box is selected, the amount is Non-reimbursable
Option.Description__c: If true, displays this Textbox on the expense UI

Option.Name: display-phase-field
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Phase field is displayed on the Expense Entry page and when creating and editing expense reports. The default value is true.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Phase field is displayed on the Expense Entry page and when creating and editing expense reports. The default value is true.

Option.Name: empty-expense-lines-to-append-by-default
Option.Help_Text__c: This is the minimum no of lines that will be always available for new ExpenseEntry UI.
Option.Description__c: This is the minimum no of lines that will be always available for new ExpenseEntry UI

Option.Name: empty-expense-lines-to-append-on-add-lines
Option.Help_Text__c: This is the minimum no of lines that will be added on clicking add new rows for new ExpenseEntry UI.
Option.Description__c: This is the minimum no of lines that will be added on clicking add new rows for new ExpenseEntry UI.

Option.Name: expense-attachment-batch-size
Option.Help_Text__c: Use this configuration option to avoid the Apex heap size limit exception when moving attachments to expense reports during their creation. The default value is 5.
Option.Description__c: Use this configuration option to avoid the Apex heap size limit exception when moving attachments to expense reports during their creation. The default value is 5.

Option.Name: expense-line-updates-synchronous-only
Option.Help_Text__c: Makes updates from Expense Report to Expense Lines (other than Action: Include...) always synchronous, default true. If false, PSE uses @future calls for Expense updates when record count is greater than 'max-synchronous-expense-lines' config.
Option.Description__c: Makes updates from Expense Report to Expense Lines (other than Action: Include...) always synchronous, default true. If false, PSE uses @future calls for Expense updates when record count is greater than 'max-synchronous-expense-lines' config.

Option.Name: expense-queue-batch-size
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines the batch size of assignments, milestones, and expense reports used when rolling up data from expenses to assignments, milestones, and expense reports. This option also determines the batch size of expenses or expense reports to be processed in a single queueable when parent expense reports or child expenses are updated. The default value is 1000. Contact FinancialForce Customer Support before changing this setting.
Option.Description__c: Determines the batch size used when rolling up data from expenses to assignments, milestones, and expense reports. Also determines the batch size of expenses or expense reports to be processed when parent expense reports or child expenses are updated.

Option.Name: expense-report-approval-process-all-or-none
Option.Help_Text__c: This determines whether all Expense Reports auto-submitted for approval at once are handled in an 'all or none' fashion with respect to errors.
Option.Description__c: This determines whether all Expense Reports auto-submitted for approval at once are handled in an 'all or none' fashion with respect to errors.

Option.Name: expense-report-auto-submit-for-approval
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, this auto-submits Expense Reports to an existing Salesforce approval process (which must be implemented independently) based on Submitted flag.
Option.Description__c: If true, this auto-submits Expense Reports to an existing Salesforce approval process (which must be implemented independently) based on Submitted flag.

Option.Name: expense-report-name-required
Option.Help_Text__c: Decide whether Expense Report Name is Required on UI or not.
Option.Description__c: Decide whether Expense Report Name is Required on UI or not.

Option.Name: group-by-methodology
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether expenses are to be grouped into expense reports based on the selected methodology when creating expense reports from the Expense Entry page. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether expenses are to be grouped into expense reports based on the selected methodology when creating expense reports from the Expense Entry page. The default value is false.

Option.Name: group-by-phase
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether expenses are to be grouped into expense reports based on the selected phase when creating expense reports from the Expense Entry page. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether expenses are to be grouped into expense reports based on the selected phase when creating expense reports from the Expense Entry page. The default value is false.

Option.Name: max-synchronous-expense-lines
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines the maximum number of Expenses for which cascading updates from Expense Reports should be handled synchronously.
Option.Description__c: Determines the maximum number of Expenses for which cascading updates from Expense Reports should be handled synchronously.

Option.Name: minimum-expense-amount-limit-for-attachment
Option.Help_Text__c: Expenses that are equal or greater than this amount in the corporate currency need to have a receipt attachment. Expenses lower than this value do not need a receipt attachment.
Option.Description__c: Sets the minimum value in the corporate currency at which expenses will need a receipt attachment.

Option.Name: move-non-image-attachments-to-ER
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to True, attachments that are not saved as images will be copied from the Expense to the Expense Report when you collate expense attachments. The default value is False.
Option.Description__c: If set to True, attachments that are not saved as images will be copied from the Expense to the Expense Report when you collate expense attachments. The default value is False.

Option.Name: multi-expense-auto-move-attachments-to-er
Option.Help_Text__c: When true, if you create an expense report using the Submit button on the Expense Entry page, all attachments are moved from the selected expense records to the expense report. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: When true, if you create an expense report using the Submit button on the Expense Entry page, all attachments are moved from the selected expense records to the expense report. The default value is false.

Option.Name: multi-expense-er-name-date-time-suffix
Option.Help_Text__c: When true, the date time suffix is added to the names of expense reports created using the Submit button on the Expense Entry page. When false, no date time suffix is added. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: When true, the date time suffix is added to the names of expense reports created using the Submit button on the Expense Entry page. When false, no date time suffix is added. The default value is false.

Option.Name: multi-expense-er-submit-status
Option.Help_Text__c: Status to set on an expense report when created using the Submit button on the Expense Entry page. The default value is Submitted.
Option.Description__c: Status to set on an expense report when created using the Submit button on the Expense Entry page. The default value is Submitted.

Option.Name: multi-expense-recent-ers-to-show
Option.Help_Text__c: Number of expense reports to display per page on the Expense Entry page when the multi-expense-show-most-recently-created-ers configuration option is true.
Option.Description__c: Number of expense reports to display per page on the Expense Entry page when the multi-expense-show-most-recently-created-ers configuration option is true.

Option.Name: multi-expense-show-most-recently-created-ers
Option.Help_Text__c: When true an additional section appears on the Expense Entry page that lists the most recent expense reports for a resource ordered by creation date. The default value is true.
Option.Description__c: When true an additional section appears on the Expense Entry page that lists the most recent expense reports for a resource ordered by creation date. The default value is true.

Option.Name: NonReimbursable-field-position-is-popup
Option.Help_Text__c: This config flag determines whether Non-Reimbursable field should be display on notes popup or at front page. Default true (pop-up).
Option.Description__c: This config flag determines whether Non-Reimbursable field should be display on notes popup or at front page. Default true (pop-up).

Option.Name: prevent-update-calculated-total-fields-on-er
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, users cannot edit the values in the Total Billable Amount, Total Non Billable Amount and Total Reimbursement Amount fields. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: If true, users cannot edit the values in the Total Billable Amount, Total Non Billable Amount and Total Reimbursement Amount fields. The default value is false.

Option.Name: proj-assig-dropdown-account-custom-field
Option.Help_Text__c: ExpenseEntry project/Assignment lookup will display this field of account as a prefix to project or assignment name.
Option.Description__c: ExpenseEntry project/Assignment lookup will display this field of account as a prefix to project or assignment name

Option.Name: project-lookup-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: List of API names of project fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the Expense Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Account__r.Name.
Option.Description__c: List of API names of project fields to display as columns on the Project/Assignment lookup in the Expense Entry page. Do not include the pse__ namespace prefix in the API name of a field. The default value is Name, Account__r.Name.

Option.Name: project-tooltip-fields
Option.Help_Text__c: List of project fields to be shown as tooltip on ExpenseEntry UI
Option.Description__c: List of project fields to be shown as tooltip on ExpenseEntry UI

Option.Name: rate-unit-decimal-places-digits
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines how many digits to display to the right of the rate unit field's decimal point on the Edit Expense and Multi Expense pages. Values are 2, 3, and 4.
Option.Description__c: Determines how many digits to display to the right of the rate unit field's decimal point on the Edit Expense and Multi Expense pages. Values are 2, 3, and 4.

Option.Name: records-per-page-count
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines the number of per page records to be show in expense Ui's expense report table.
Option.Description__c: Determines the number of per page records to be show in expense Ui's expense report table.

Option.Name: remove-exchange-rate-overrides-on-resource-defined-rate-removal
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, removes all exhange rate overrides when resource-defined exchange rates change from defined to undefined. The default is true.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, removes all exhange rate overrides when resource-defined exchange rates change from defined to undefined. The default is true.

Option.Name: resource-load-limit
Option.Description__c: Number of Resources to be loaded for the expense resource popup

Option.Name: resource-lookup-columns
Option.Help_Text__c: List of Resource fields (full API names/paths, no pse namespace prefix) to display on columns for Resource lookup pop-up in Expense UI. Recommend at most 5 fields/columns. Default value: Name,Account.Name,Region__r.Name,Practice__r.Name,Group__r.Name
Option.Description__c: List of Resource fields (full API names/paths, no pse namespace prefix) to display on columns for Resource lookup pop-up in Expense UI. Recommend at most 5 fields/columns. Default value: Name,Account.Name,Region__r.Name,Practice__r.Name,Group__r.Name

Option.Name: retain-attachments-on-expense
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to True, all attachments that are combined and moved to the expense report will remain on the expense line. The default value is True.
Option.Description__c: If set to True, all attachments that are combined and moved to the expense report will remain on the expense line. The default value is True.

Option.Name: set-owner-to-resource-salesforce-user
Option.Description__c: Whether to set the owner of expenses to the the assigned resource user

Option.Name: show-assignmentNumber-assignment-dropdown
Option.Description__c: Whether to show the assignment number in the expense report project/assignment drop down or custom lookup

Option.Name: show-methodology-as-field
Option.Help_Text__c: The field to use as the methodology name field. When you specify a valid field name, the value of that field is displayed in place of the Methodology Name for all the methodologies shown in the list. Lookup __r references are not allowed.
Option.Description__c: The field to use as the methodology name field. When you specify a valid field name, the value of that field is displayed in place of the Methodology Name for all the methodologies shown in the list. Lookup __r references are not allowed.

Option.Name: show-methodology-on-popup
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the related Methodology is displayed in the Detail section of the Expense Entry page. When false, the field is displayed in the expense line.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the related Methodology is displayed in the Detail section of the Expense Entry page. When false, the field is displayed in the expense line.

Option.Name: show-milestone-as-field
Option.Help_Text__c: Contain Field Name whose value will be shown on ExpenseEntry UI milestone drop down list. If this config is missing or null, UI will show the Milestone name in the drop-down list. No lookup __r references allowed.
Option.Description__c: Contain Field Name whose value will be shown on ExpenseEntry UI milestone drop down list. If this config is missing or null, UI will show the Milestone name in the drop-down list. No lookup __r references allowed.

Option.Name: show-milestone-on-popup
Option.Help_Text__c: When true, the related milestone is shown on the Additional Fields section of the Expense Entry page. When false, the related milestone is displayed on the main on the Expense Entry page.
Option.Description__c: When true, the related milestone is shown on the Additional Fields section of the Expense Entry page. When false, the related milestone is displayed on the main on the Expense Entry page.

Option.Name: show-phase-as-field
Option.Help_Text__c: The field to use as the phase name field. When you specify a valid field name, the value of that field is displayed in place of the Phase Name for all the phases shown in the list. Lookup __r references are not allowed.
Option.Description__c: The field to use as the phase name field. When you specify a valid field name, the value of that field is displayed in place of the Phase Name for all the phases shown in the list. Lookup __r references are not allowed.

Option.Name: show-phase-on-popup
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the related Phase is displayed in the Detail section of the Expense Entry page. When false, the field is displayed in the expense line.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the related Phase is displayed in the Detail section of the Expense Entry page. When false, the field is displayed in the expense line.

Option.Name: show-projectName-assignment-dropdown
Option.Description__c: Whether to show the project name in the expense report project/assignment drop down or custom lookup

Option.Name: show-tax-type-on-popup
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether the Tax Type field is displayed in the Detail section of the Expense Entry and Edit Expense pages. When false, the field is displayed in the expense line. The default value is True.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether the Tax Type field is displayed in the Detail section of the Expense Entry and Edit Expense pages. When false, the field is displayed in the expense line. The default value is True.

Option.Name: top-assignments-to-show-count
Option.Description__c: Number of top assignments to be loaded to show on Expense Project/assignment overlay

Option.Name: top-projects-to-show-count
Option.Description__c: Number of top projects to be loaded to show on Expense Project/assignment overlay

Option.Name: ui-ajax-timeout-ms
Option.Help_Text__c: The maximum number of milliseconds to wait on the Expense Entry page before enabling the input fields.
Option.Description__c: The maximum number of milliseconds to wait on the Expense Entry page before enabling the input fields.

Option.Name: undelete-expenses-on-er-undelete
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, auto-undelete all child Expenses in recycle bin when parent Expense Report is undeleted. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If true, auto-undelete all child Expenses in recycle bin when parent Expense Report is undeleted. Default false.

Option.Name: update-approver-on-edit
Option.Help_Text__c: This config will decide whether to update the approver on Expense Report if it is edited. It is dependent on AssignProjectManagerToExpenseReportApprover config.
Option.Description__c: This config will decide whether to update the approver on Expense Report if it is edited. It is dependent on AssignProjectManagerToExpenseReportApprover config.

Option.Name: update-er-from-exp-sync
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, this forces updates from Expenses to Expense Reports to be synchronous. If false, the same updates may be asynchronous.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, this forces updates from Expenses to Expense Reports to be synchronous. If false, the same updates may be asynchronous.

Option.Name: update-expense-exchange-rate-amounts-post-submit
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, continues to update expense amounts post-submit based on updated currency exchange rates for expense dates. If set to false, leaves exchange rates on expenses as-is post-submit.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, continues to update expense amounts post-submit based on updated currency exchange rates for expense dates. If set to false, leaves exchange rates on expenses as-is post-submit.

Option.Name: use-expense-date-to-convert-rates-limits
Option.Help_Text__c: When true, the date on an expense line is used to convert the expense limits and rates to the target currency. When false, the effective date on expense limits and rates is used. This is the default behavior.
Option.Description__c: When true, the date on an expense line is used to convert the expense limits and rates to the target currency. When false, the effective date on expense limits and rates is used. This is the default behavior.

Option.Name: use-fieldset-for-expense-ui
Option.Help_Text__c: Allows you to switch your preferred method of managing visible fields on the Expense Entry and Edit Expense pages. If False, PSA will use configuration options to configure the UI. If True, PSA will use field sets to configure the UI.
Option.Description__c: Allows you to switch your preferred method of managing visible fields on the Expense Entry and Edit Expense pages. If False, PSA will use configuration options to configure the UI. If True, PSA will use field sets to configure the UI.

Option.Name: use-highest-expense-limit-amount
Option.Description__c: Whether to use the highest expense limit (true) or lowest (false) when there are overlapping expense limits

Option.Name: width-px-for-currency
Option.Help_Text__c: Controls the pixel width for Currency column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 120px
Option.Description__c: Controls the pixel width for Currency column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 120px

Option.Name: width-px-for-date
Option.Help_Text__c: Controls the pixel width for Date column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 70 px
Option.Description__c: Controls the pixel width for Date column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 70 px

Option.Name: width-px-for-description
Option.Help_Text__c: Controls the pixel width for Description column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 120px
Option.Description__c: Controls the pixel width for Description column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 120px

Option.Name: width-px-for-methodology-drop-down
Option.Help_Text__c: Width of the Methodology drop-down list to be displayed inline on the Expense Entry page in pixels.
Option.Description__c: Width of the Methodology drop-down list to be displayed inline on the Expense Entry page in pixels.

Option.Name: width-px-for-milestone-drop-down
Option.Help_Text__c: Hold the width of the milestone drop down field to be shown on expense entry UI
Option.Description__c: Hold the width of the milestone drop down field to be shown on expense entry UI

Option.Name: width-px-for-phase-drop-down
Option.Help_Text__c: Width of the phase drop-down list to be displayed inline on the Expense Entry page in pixels.
Option.Description__c: Width of the phase drop-down list to be displayed inline on the Expense Entry page in pixels.

Option.Name: width-px-for-project-assig-lookup
Option.Help_Text__c: Controls the pixel width for Project/Assignment column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 230px
Option.Description__c: Controls the pixel width for Project/Assignment column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 230px

Option.Name: width-px-for-status
Option.Help_Text__c: Controls the pixel width for Status column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default is 50px
Option.Description__c: Controls the pixel width for Status column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default is 50px

Option.Name: width-px-for-total-amount
Option.Help_Text__c: Controls the pixel width for Total Amount column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 80px
Option.Description__c: Controls the pixel width for Total Amount column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default value is 80px

Option.Name: width-px-for-type
Option.Help_Text__c: Controls the pixel width for Type column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default 170px
Option.Description__c: Controls the pixel width for Type column on multiple Expense Entry UI. Please specify a whole number for this value, as this will directly go into width. For ex a value 300 will set the width to 300px. Default 170px

Group.Name: Hierarchy
Group.Description__c: Configurations related to Hierarchies such as those set up for Regions, Practices, Groups, and in some cases, Projects.

Option.Name: allow-deletion-with-child-projects
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether Regions/Practices/Groups can be deleted when they have child Projects.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether Regions/Practices/Groups can be deleted when they have child Projects.

Option.Name: allow-deletion-with-child-resources
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether Regions/Practices/Groups can be deleted when they have child Resources.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether Regions/Practices/Groups can be deleted when they have child Resources.

Option.Name: max-top-level-groups
Option.Help_Text__c: This indicates the maximum number of top-level Groups allowed in the system. A top-level Group is one with no parent Group. For version 1.0, this value must be set to 1 after data-provisioning for parts of PSE to work correctly.
Option.Description__c: This indicates the maximum number of top-level Groups allowed in the system. A top-level Group is one with no parent Group. For version 1.0, this value must be set to 1 after data-provisioning for parts of PSE to work correctly.

Option.Name: max-top-level-practices
Option.Help_Text__c: This indicates the maximum number of top-level Practices allowed in the system. A top-level Practice is one with no parent Practice. For version 1.0, this value must be set to 1 after data-provisioning for parts of PSE to work correctly.
Option.Description__c: This indicates the maximum number of top-level Practices allowed in the system. A top-level Practice is one with no parent Practice. For version 1.0, this value must be set to 1 after data-provisioning for parts of PSE to work correctly.

Option.Name: max-top-level-regions
Option.Help_Text__c: This indicates the maximum number of top-level Regions allowed in the system. A top-level Region is one with no parent Region. For version 1.0, this value must be set to 1 after data-provisioning for parts of PSE to work correctly.
Option.Description__c: This indicates the maximum number of top-level Regions allowed in the system. A top-level Region is one with no parent Region. For version 1.0, this value must be set to 1 after data-provisioning for parts of PSE to work correctly.

Group.Name: Milestone
Group.Description__c: Configurations related to Milestones

Option.Name: auto-share-with-project-manager-user
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the level of sharing with the project manager for newly created milestones. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.
Option.Description__c: Defines the level of sharing with the project manager for newly created milestones. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.

Option.Name: auto-share-with-project-resources
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the level of sharing for milestones with project resources when creating a new assignment or a new milestone. You can choose from the values: None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.
Option.Description__c: Defines the level of sharing for milestones with project resources when creating a new assignment or a new milestone. You can choose from the values: None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.

Option.Name: default-timecard-bill-rate-from-milestone
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, allows Milestone-driven Bill Rates on Timecards for Milestones that are set up to apply Timecard Bill Rates. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If true, allows Milestone-driven Bill Rates on Timecards for Milestones that are set up to apply Timecard Bill Rates. Default false.

Option.Name: milestone-cost-data-editable-after-billing
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true, this will make the Milestone Cost Data (Milestone Cost, Log Milestone Cost As External) editable even after the Milestone is marked as Billed or Invoiced.
Option.Description__c: If set to true, this will make the Milestone Cost Data (Milestone Cost, Log Milestone Cost As External) editable even after the Milestone is marked as Billed or Invoiced.

Option.Name: turn-off-task-time-roll-up-on-milestone
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, the roll up of project task hours on the milestone is turned off. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: If true, the roll up of project task hours on the milestone is turned off. The default value is false.

Option.Name: update-approver-on-edit
Option.Help_Text__c: This config will decide whether to update the approver on Milestone if it is edited. It is dependent on AssignProjectManagerToMilestoneApprover config.
Option.Description__c: This config will decide whether to update the approver on Milestone if it is edited. It is dependent on AssignProjectManagerToMilestoneApprover config.

Group.Name: Miscellaneous Adjustment
Group.Description__c: Contains config related to Miscellaneous Adjustments.

Option.Name: auto-share-with-project-manager-user
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the level of sharing with the project manager for newly created miscellaneous adjustments. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.
Option.Description__c: Defines the level of sharing with the project manager for newly created miscellaneous adjustments. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.

Option.Name: auto-share-with-project-resources
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the level of sharing with assigned project resources for newly miscellaneous adjustments. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.
Option.Description__c: Defines the level of sharing with assigned project resources for newly miscellaneous adjustments. You can choose from the values None, Read or Edit. The default value is None.

Option.Name: update-approver-on-edit
Option.Help_Text__c: This config will decide whether to update the approver on Miscellaneous Adjustment if it is edited. It is dependent on AssignProjectManagerToMiscellaneousAdjustmentApprover config.
Option.Description__c: This config will decide whether to update the approver on Miscellaneous Adjustment if it is edited. It is dependent on AssignProjectManagerToMiscellaneousAdjustmentApprover config.

Group.Name: Project
Group.Description__c: Configurations related to Projects

Option.Name: create-project.opp-to-project-field-map
Option.Description__c: A mapping of opportunity fields to project fields to copy when creating a project from an opportunity. The values are formatted as <Opp field>=<Project field> (e.g., Custom_Opp_Field__c=Custom_Proj_Field__c)

Option.Name: default-opportunity-owner-if-blank
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, defaults the Opportunity Owner field on the Project from the Opportunity. This already happens automatically for the Create Project process, but this configuration may be useful for data loads. Default false.
Option.Description__c: If true, defaults the Opportunity Owner field on the Project from the Opportunity. This already happens automatically for the Create Project process, but this configuration may be useful for data loads. Default false.

Option.Name: default-resource-cost-rate-constant-in-currency-of
Option.Description__c: Whether the default resource cost rate is shown in the currency of the project or the resource

Group.Name: Resource Requests
Group.Description__c: Settings for create resource requests page

Option.Name: allow-to-assign-a-resource-with-different-role
Option.Help_Text__c: When creating an assignment or held resource request in Bottom-up planning and using 'By Resource' to split PTAs, determines that the resource defined on the PTA is assigned by the PTA role, irrespective of the contact role. The default is False.
Option.Description__c: When creating an assignment or held resource request in Bottom-up planning and using 'By Resource' to split PTAs, determines that the resource defined on the PTA is assigned by the PTA role, irrespective of the contact role. The default is False.

Option.Name: auto-update-pta-with-assigned-resource
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to True and you staff a resource request, the Resource lookup on source project task assignments is automatically updated to match the resource assigned on the resulting assignment. You must staff a resource request for this setting to take effect. The default value is False: you may want to enable this setting if your organization takes a bottom up approach to planning and estimating projects.
Option.Description__c: If set to True and you staff a resource request, the Resource lookup on source project task assignments is automatically updated to match the resource assigned on the resulting assignment. You must staff a resource request for this setting to take effect.

Option.Name: auto-update-pta-with-held-resource
Option.Help_Text__c: When True and you hold a resource request, the Resource lookup on source project task assignments is automatically updated to match the resource held on the resource request. You must have a held resource request for this setting to take effect. Enable this setting if your organization uses Bottom-up planning. The default value is False.
Option.Description__c: When True and you hold a resource request, the Resource lookup on source project task assignments is automatically updated to match the resource held on the resource request. You must have a held resource request for this setting to take effect.

Option.Name: auto-update-rr-with-assigned-resource
Option.Help_Text__c: If true and the assigned resource changes, the source resource request lookup is automatically updated to match the resource. The default is false. You may want to enable this setting when taking a bottom up approach to planning and estimating projects.
Option.Description__c: If true and the assigned resource changes, the source resource request lookup is automatically updated to match the resource. The default is false. You may want to enable this setting when taking a bottom up approach to planning and estimating projects.

Option.Name: copy-percent-allocated
Option.Help_Text__c: When true, the percent allocated value on a resource request is copied to the assignment when assigning a resource on the Assign Resource (single staffer) page.
Option.Description__c: When true, the percent allocated value on a resource request is copied to the assignment when assigning a resource on the Assign Resource (single staffer) page.

Option.Name: copy-planned-bill-rate
Option.Help_Text__c: Whether to copy Planned Bill Rate when an Assignment is created from a Resource Request.
Option.Description__c: Whether to copy Planned Bill Rate when an Assignment is created from a Resource Request.

Option.Name: copy-resource-role
Option.Help_Text__c: Whether to copy resource role from the resource request to the assignment when an assignment is created from a resource request.
Option.Description__c: Whether to copy resource role from the resource request to the assignment when an assignment is created from a resource request.

Option.Name: copyRRMilestoneToAssignment
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether the trigger code that copy milestone from RR to assignment fires. This code copy milestone available on the RR to the assignment created using RR.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether the trigger code that copy milestone from RR to assignment fires. This code copy milestone available on the RR to the assignment created using RR.

Option.Name: create-resource-request-with-no-opp-update-permission
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates when a user without opportunity access can create a resource request from a PTA. When True, you can create a RR from a project without having to select the Opportunity on the resource request. Default is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates when a user without opportunity access can create a resource request from a PTA. When True, you can create a RR from a project without having to select the Opportunity on the resource request. Default is false.

Option.Name: create-rr-if-pta-not-having-resource-when-create-assignment
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether users are prompted to create resource requests for any project task assignments without a resource after creating assignments or held resource requests for project task assignments with a resource. The default value is False.
Option.Description__c: If true, users are prompted to create resource requests for any project task assignments without a resource after creating assignments or held resource requests for project task assignments with a resource.

Option.Name: create_RR_only_where_all_info_available_on_PTA
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to True, only project task assignments with all required information will be considered when generating resource requests. If set to False, missing required information will be treated as null and processed. The default value is False.
Option.Description__c: If set to True, only project task assignments with all required information will be considered when generating resource requests. If set to False, missing required information will be treated as null and processed. The default value is False.

Option.Name: custom-primary-skill-lookup
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to false,display native lookup on resource request UI for skill/cert selection. If set to true, display custom lookup for skill/cert selection.
Option.Description__c: If set to false,display native lookup on resource request UI for skill/cert selection. If set to true, display custom lookup for skill/cert selection.

Option.Name: default-no-primary-skill
Option.Help_Text__c: This config will allow Is_Primary__c checkbox on resource skill request unchecked when creating New Resource Skill Request while creating Resource Request
Option.Description__c: This config will allow Is_Primary__c checkbox on resource skill request unchecked when creating New Resource Skill Request while creating Resource Request

Option.Name: default-request-priority
Option.Description__c: The default value for the request priority

Option.Name: default-resource-role
Option.Description__c: The default Resource Role value for new resource requests

Option.Name: default-role-on-rate-card-set
Option.Description__c: Sets the default resource role for rate cards that have not been associated with a rate card set on the Create Rate Card Set page.

Option.Name: default-start-and-end-dates-from-project
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, then Project start/end dates will set to RR's on creation page(s)
Option.Description__c: If true, then Project start/end dates will set to RR's on creation page(s)

Option.Name: empty-resource-request-lines-to-create-on-mass-update
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines the number of rows to add on clicking create new resource requests on mass update resource request ui.
Option.Description__c: Determines the number of rows to add on clicking create new resource requests on mass update resource request ui.

Option.Name: ensure-skill-requests-saved-with-resource-request
Option.Help_Text__c: If set to true and RR have attached Resource Skill Request than RR will always ensure that Resource Skill Requests are being saved. If it failed to save Resource Skill requests for some reason than RR will not be created.
Option.Description__c: If set to true and RR have attached Resource Skill Request than RR will always ensure that Resource Skill Requests are being saved. If it failed to save Resource Skill requests for some reason than RR will not be created.

Option.Name: hide-bill-rate-column
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether the Bill Rate column is hidden on the Generate Assignments from Project Task Assignments UI. Determines whether all Bill Rate fields including totals are hidden from the Unfilled Resource Requests UI. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether the Bill Rate column is hidden on the Generate Assignments from Project Task Assignments UI. Determines whether all Bill Rate fields including totals are hidden from the Unfilled Resource Requests UI. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-cost-rate-column
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether the Cost Rate column is hidden on the Generate Assignments from Project Task Assignments UI. Determines whether all Cost Rate fields including totals are hidden from the Unfilled Resource Requests UI. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether the Cost Rate column is hidden on the Generate Assignments from Project Task Assignments UI. Determines whether all Cost Rate fields including totals are hidden from the Unfilled Resource Requests UI. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-hours-avg-cost-rate-column
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether the Hours * Avg Cost Rate column including any totals are hidden on Generate Resource Requests from Project Tasks, Generate Held Resource Requests from Project Tasks, and Unfilled Resource Requests UIs. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether the Hours * Avg Cost Rate column including any totals are hidden on Generate Resource Requests from Project Tasks, Generate Held Resource Requests from Project Tasks, and Unfilled Resource Requests UIs. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-hours-suggested-bill-rate-column
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether the Hours * Suggested Bill Rate column including any totals are hidden on Generate Resource Requests from Project Tasks, Generate Held Resource Requests from Project Tasks, and Unfilled Resource Requests UIs. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Determines whether the Hours * Suggested Bill Rate column including any totals are hidden on Generate Resource Requests from Project Tasks, Generate Held Resource Requests from Project Tasks, and Unfilled Resource Requests UIs. The default value is false.

Option.Name: hide-overlap-pta-with-resource-role
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether project task assignments that overlap with a resource request's or assignment's resource role are hidden. If true, overlapping project task assignments are hidden.
Option.Description__c: If true, project task assignments that overlap with a resource request's or assignment's resource role are hidden.

Option.Name: hide-overlap-pta-with-start-and-end-date
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether project task assignments that overlap with a resource request's or assignment's start and end dates are hidden. If true, overlapping project task assignments are hidden.
Option.Description__c: If true, project task assignments that overlap with a resource request's or assignment's start and end dates are hidden.

Option.Name: ignore-pta-not-having-resource-when-create-assignment
Option.Help_Text__c: Determines whether project task assignments without assigned resources are ignored when assignments or held resource requests are created. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: If true, project task assignments without assigned resources are ignored when assignments or held resource requests are created.

Option.Name: mass-update-resource-request-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the name of a field set containing resource request fields to display as columns in each row on the Mass Update Resource Requests page.
Option.Description__c: Defines the name of a field set containing resource request fields to display as columns in each row on the Mass Update Resource Requests page.

Option.Name: precedence-for-rate-cards
Option.Description__c: The precedence of rate cards if there are multiple matching rate cards

Option.Name: pta-filter-fieldset-name
Option.Help_Text__c: Defines the name of a field set containing project task and project task assignment fields to display as filter fields on the Mass Link Project Task Assignments page.
Option.Description__c: Defines the name of a field set containing project task and project task assignment fields to display as filter fields on the Mass Link Project Task Assignments page.

Option.Name: pta_fieldset_to_split_resource_request
Option.Help_Text__c: Allows you to split task-generated resource requests by additional attributes. Enter the API name of a field set (on the Project Task Assignment object) containing either project task assignment or project task fields.
Option.Description__c: Allows you to split task-generated resource requests by additional attributes. Enter the API name of a field set (on the Project Task Assignment object) containing either project task assignment or project task fields.

Option.Name: rrset-cancellation-status
Option.Help_Text__c: The status to set on other resource requests when a resource request belonging to the same resource request set is staffed. The default value is Cancelled.
Option.Description__c: The status to set on other resource requests when a resource request belonging to the same resource request set is staffed. The default value is Cancelled.

Option.Name: use-highest-bill-rate-cost-rate-margin
Option.Help_Text__c: When this setting is selected, rate cards will use the highest margin between the suggested bill rate and the average cost rate. If this setting is not selected, rate cards will use the highest bill rate.The default value is False.
Option.Description__c: When this setting is selected, rate cards will use the highest margin between the suggested bill rate and the average cost rate. If this setting is not selected, rate cards will use the highest bill rate.The default value is False.

Option.Name: use-resource-request-sets
Option.Help_Text__c: Indicates whether PSA is to use resource request sets. This controls whether triggers used in the resource request set functionality are executed. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: Indicates whether PSA is to use resource request sets. This controls whether triggers used in the resource request set functionality are executed. The default value is false.

Group.Name: Resource Single Staffer
Group.Description__c: Config Options related to "Single-Staffer": staffing from a single Resource Request using component on the Resource Request detail page.

Option.Name: assign-using-existing-schedule
Option.Description__c: If true, when you click the Assign link next to the resource, the resource is assigned using the existing schedule (if any) associated with the resource request. A schedule is created if one does not exist.

Option.Name: DefaultCostRateVisible
Option.Description__c: If true, the default cost rate column is visible for resources in the Single Staffer. Default is true.

Option.Name: hold-using-existing-schedule
Option.Description__c: If true, when you click the Hold link next to the resource, the resource is held using the existing schedule (if any) associated with the resource request. A schedule is created if one does not exist.

Option.Name: MaxAssignmentResults
Option.Description__c: Maximum number of assignments counted for each resource in a search

Option.Name: MaxResourceRequestResults
Option.Description__c: Maximum number of held resource requests counted for each resource where the preferred schedule overlaps the dates of the resource request.

Option.Name: MaxResourceSearchResults
Option.Help_Text__c: Maximum number of resource records to be returned when searching for resources in the Assign Resource section of the Resource Request Detail page.
Option.Description__c: Maximum number of resource records to be returned when searching for resources in the Assign Resource section of the Resource Request Detail page.

Option.Name: MaxSkillResults
Option.Description__c: Maximum number of skills to display in detail (expanded) view of resource, ordered by rating in descending order

Option.Name: ShowPlannedBillRate
Option.Description__c: Whether to show the Planned Bill Rate field on the UI

Option.Name: UnitType
Option.Description__c: Type of organizational hierarchy to use when viewing resources in the Single Staffer

Option.Name: use-sharing-setting
Option.Description__c: Not currently supported. All records are displayed.

Group.Name: Resource Staffer
Group.Description__c: Resource staffer configurations

Option.Name: DefaultSchedulingStrategy
Option.Picklist_Values__c: Calculate End Date, Level Schedule Calculate End Date, Ignore Availability Adjust Hours Per Day Custom Percent Allocation Zero Hour Schedule
Option.Help_Text__c: The default scheduling strategy for the Schedule Strategy field on the Assign Resource to Project page and the Assign Resource section of the Resource Request page. The default value is "Calculate End Date Level Schedule".
Option.Description__c: The default scheduling strategy for the Schedule Strategy field on the Assign Resource to Project page and the Assign Resource section of the Resource Request page. The default value is "Calculate End Date Level Schedule".

Option.Name: use-task-based-schedule-creation-strategy
Option.Help_Text__c: If true, the Task Based Schedule Creation strategy is used when creating task-driven resource requests and assignments. If false, the Adjust End Date strategy is used. The default value is false.
Option.Description__c: If true, the Task Based Schedule Creation strategy is used when creating task-driven resource requests and assignments. If false, the Adjust End Date strategy is used. The default value is false.

Group.Name: Resources
Group.Description__c: Configurations associated with Resources and Resource fields (e.g. Work Calendar)

Option.Name: allow-global-resources
